attributes.action: Include motorcycles in the scrappage scheme
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The scrappage scheme currently only applies to cars. Would it not be more environmentally friendly to encourage people onto two wheels by extending this scheme to cover motorcycles as well?(they use less fuel,burn fuel more efficiently and use less road space than cars). This would aid motorcycle dealers and all associated clothing and equipment suppliers in this country.
